metadata.name: Ardent Eye
metadata.description:
An eye look in awe at a dazzling, ardent and striking fire scene. Started with a circle, the minimalist symbol of an eye, then worked my way to play around with styles, shapes and colors, to evoke the eye that reflects what it is witnessing.

I love watching the wood while burning in a fire pit, since it is both dazzling and soothing, and it can make you dream and reflect at the same time. It also creates a great atmosphere for story-telling among family and friends.
